instruction: Construct a high-quality natural language query for a systematic review topic: Laparoscopy for diagnosing resectability of disease in patients with advanced ovarian cancer. The effectiveness of the query will be determined by its capability to retrieve relevant documents when searching on a semantic-based search engine.
output:
SELECT * 
FROM papers 
WHERE topic = "Laparoscopy for diagnosing resectability of disease in patients with advanced ovarian cancer" 
AND text LIKE '%(laparoscopy AND (resectability OR advanced OR ovarian OR cancer)%') 
AND text LIKE '%(effectiveness OR efficacy OR diagnostic OR treatment)%';
